alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 4:58PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wyandotte and northeastern Johnson Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 458 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shawnee, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Overland Park, Olathe, Shawnee, Lenexa, Merriam, Bonner Springs, Edwardsville, Lake Quivira, Kansas City and Holliday. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 in Kansas between mile markers 226 and 228. Interstate 435 between mile markers 2 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
